subject: Pro X calibration doesn't stick
description_text:
Hello there,

I purchased the Simsonn Pro X pedals and for some reason I have to
re-calibrate them every time I restart my PC. This only seems to affect the
brakes however. They lose calibration completely.
The throttle stays calibrated.

Any help would be appreciated.

Thanks
Marc

conversations.body_text: Hi Marc Bonaldo,  Hello, may I confirm whether the calibration cannot be saved in SIMSONN Manager 2.1.0? Please try downloading the latest version 2.1.2. Also, could you clarify whether the issue occurs in the game (calibration not saving) or in our calibration software itself? You may also upload a short video via Google Drive and grant access permission, so we can review it and provide a quick solution.Â
